metadata.title: CVE-2013-1960 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in the t2p_process_jpeg_strip function intiff2pdf in libtiff 4.0.3 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via a craftedTIFF image file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-1960` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.2-4ubuntu3
libtiff-tools - 4.0.2-4ubuntu3
libtiff5 - 4.0.2-4ubuntu3
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.2-4ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.2-4ubuntu3').
